ingredients.ingredient: 1 (2 pound) package frozen Southern-style hash brown potatoes
1 (1 pound) loaf processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®), cubed
1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup

cookingTips: Mix frozen potatoes directly into the sour cream mixture without thawing for best texture
Toss corn flakes with melted butter before topping for even browning and crispness
Bake covered at 350°F until hot throughout, then uncover to crisp the topping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can I ensure the casserole is heated through while getting a crispy, golden corn flake topping?
